title: 12 Rules Lectures: New York April; London May
description:
New York Tickets: http://bit.ly/2F9yoEi
London Tickets: http://bit.ly/2UwOrRP

I am pleased to announce two more 12 Rules for Life Tour lectures. 

The first is in New York, Wednesday April 17, 7:30, at the Beacon Theatre. General tickets on sale now at https:www.jordanbpeterson.com/events (as well as links above)

The second is in London, UK, Wednesday May 8, 7:30 at the Apollo Eventim (formerly the Hammersmith). 

London show presale began Wednesday March 13 at 10:00 am local time, and ends Thursday March 14 at 10:00 pm, local time. General on sale starts Friday March 15, 10:00 am local time. https://jordanbpeterson.com/events (as well as links above). 

Hope to see you there. This will probably be the last 12 Rules lecture until Europe in September.
